Subject: Heritrix 3 : How to enable the Javascript engine in DOM building

Hi,

I understood that Heritrix 3 has Javascript support. As such I'm wonde=
ring if it's possible (and anyone actually has experience with that) to cra=
wl the pages with javascript enabled?

By Javascript support I mean : behav=
ing like a browser with decent/standard javascript capabilities. As such al=
l the pages that are crawled would be first (before the HTML link extractio=
n) loaded in a Webkit like environment and then once the javascript code is=
 loaded and finished running =3D> the DOM is builded. Once this is done the=
 HTML extractor kicks in and continues the crawl.

I know that Heritrix 3 h=
as support for extracting URL's from JS code and I understood how that work=
s. But that doesn't help to much if an AJAX request has to be done/finished=
 for the DOM to be complete. 

Thanks,
Paul.
